short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bundlephobia extension to check the size of a package.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a web extension that wraps the super awesome tool, Bundlephobia(https://bundlephobia.com/), with whom you can check the size of a package directly in your browser, without the need to open a new tab, when viewing it on github or npmjs.
